Dragos/Deepstar:
"No there is one worse than that."Dragos/Deepstar looks to the ground,"Loosing four parts to you"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
ï¿½Windlord:


"I know something worse..."said Windlord "Being taken away and 
reprogramed to serve a cause due to be Rodimus' love..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> Dragos/Deepstar:
> looks into nightshades eyes. "Take a tip from us, We have traveled 
far under our own choice, Your have made yours, but the slate 
between the three of us is nothing," Dragos/Deepstar puts thier hand 
on nightshades shoulder, "You are have a good spark, Don't ever let 
that change." Dragos/Deepstar removes thier hand and gestures to the 
base, "Care to shpw us the way?"
>

> "Hey, could be worse. You could be worknig for Hydras. He left me 
> under a pile fo rocks for who slagin knows how long." She smirked 
at 
> him.
>

being

think
